Services

Our company offers services tailored to your needs.

Our services

  • Value estimation of properties (villas, apartments, PPE, residential buildings, commercial and industrial buildings, vacant land, etc.).
  • Various real estate advice.
  • Value estimation of real rights (prohibition / restriction of building rights, build easements, rights of way, DDP, etc.).
  • Real estate appraisal training.

Types of reports

We offer several report formats at varying levels of detail. We will help you choose the right format, based on the context and complexity of the work, and your own requirements

Thus, we offer you the opportunity to choose between two types of services:

  • Full appraisal reports
  • More succinct property advices

We would like to fulfill your needs in the best way by helping you to choose the report type which is the most appropriate to your situation.

Our fees

We charge our services based on the time required to complete the work on an hourly basis of fr. 150.- to 200.-.

This can vary greatly, depending on the complexity of the task and client expectations. Before starting work, we always offer a free quotation with no obligation, so you can make a considered decision.

Various illustrative quotation examples are presented under our FAQ section.
